alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 4:54PM CDT until October 04 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... West central Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Norman, or 4 miles northwest of Lake Thunderbird, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Oklahoma City, Norman, Pink, Stella, Lake Thunderbird, and Little Axe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
